title: Equinor and ENGIE team up to produce hydrogen from gas
lead: The project will be designed to capture carbon dioxide and store it permanently offshore

title: Dutch village to get power from pig poo
lead: Almost 250,000 tonnes of pig manure will be converted into biogas

title: PM2.5 air pollution claims 160,000 lives in five cities
lead: Delhi, Mexico and São Paulo are the cities with the highest death tolls, new research finds

title: Americans burn furniture for heating as power outages rock Texas
lead: Texas Governor has blamed renewables for power issues

title: British Gas to hike energy bills by £97 a year
lead: Around 2.3m customers’ bills will rise to £1,138, the maximum amount suppliers can charge in line with Ofgem’s energy price cap

title: Fertilisers turned into ‘carbon-free’ shipping fuel
lead: New partnership aims to establish ‘Europe’s first’ large-scale green ammonia project in Norway

title: Industry bodies call for four-point plan to fix Green Homes Grant
lead: Almost 35% of members admit payment delays are threatening the viability of their business, a new survey finds

title: Four ways telematics can support commercial fleet electrification
lead: Now more than ever, it’s vital for us think about our long-term impact on the environment.

title: More than 1.4m households eligible for cold weather payment due to Storm Darcy
lead: Eligible households are able to apply for £25 in financial aid

title: Iberdrola pours €1bn into floating wind farm
lead: The 300MW project is predicted to create 2,800 new jobs every year until it becomes operational in 2026
